items.title: Telecom minister Scindia rules out any more govt relief for Voda Idea: Report
items.description: Jyotiraditya Scindia said that Vodafone Idea won’t be bailed out further through the equity conversion route

items.title: Mrs Bectors Food Specialities: Will it resume industry leading earnings growth?
items.description: MBFSL is accelerating new product launches (with a focus on premiumisation) which would remain the key growth driver

items.title: Chart of the Day: The transformation at dairy companies
items.description: Revenues from value-added products are rising faster than liquid milk sales
